en-US.alert_about: Embed shortcuts within other shortcuts, streamlining the development of complicated shortcuts.
en-US.alert_donate: Thank you for donating and supporting my development of shortcuts like Embed Shortcuts!

en-US.prompt_donate:
Have you been enjoying how Embed Shortcuts has enhanced and streamlined your development of writing shortcuts?

If so, consider sending me a tip as a token of appreciation!
